items.title: Spurs captain Romero given additional ban after red card
items.summary: Tottenham captain Cristian Romero is given an additional one-match suspension and fined ¬£50,000 for his behaviour during his side's Premier League defeat to Liverpool last month.

items.title: VI Live: Senegal aan de leiding na keepersfout, ook Marokko in actie
items.summary: Na een onderbreking van ruim twee weken wordt vrijdag eindelijk de Eredivisie weer hervat. Om 20.00 uur staan NEC en FC Utrecht tegenover elkaar. Daarnaast speelt Marokko op dat tijdstip de kwartfinale van de Afrika Cup tegen Kameroen en wordt er gespeeld in de Keuken Kampioen Divisie. Volg alles in de VI Live.

items.title: ADO Den Haag in zee met Cedric van der Gun
items.summary: Cedric van der Gun gaat aan de slag bij ADO Den Haag. De oud-speler van de club is aangesteld als assistent-technisch manager. Hij wordt de rest van het seizoen de rechterhand van technisch directeur Mark Wotte.

items.title: Guardiola noemt transfer Semenyo een uitzondering en ziet trend in Engels voetbal
items.summary: Manchester City neemt het zaterdag in de FA Cup op tegen Exeter City. In dat duel zullen alle ogen gericht zijn op de nieuwe aanwinst van de Engelse topclub, Antoine Semenyo. Op de persconferentie in aanloop naar het bekerduel ging manager Pep Guardiola in op het snelle handelen op de transfermarkt.

items.title: Chelsea charged after bottle thrown following Villa loss
items.summary: The Football Association (FA) charges Chelsea after a bottle is thrown towards Aston Villa's bench in December.

Check out some of the storylines ahead of the action which gets underway with four matches tonight. Today‚Äôs Rumour Mill has been released into the wild. How many bloody defenders do Arsenal need?! items.title: Datamodel voorspelt: PSV kampioen, NAC moet vrezen voor degradatie
items.summary: Mits het winterse weer geen roet in het eten gooit, gaat dit weekend de tweede seizoenshelft van start. Op basis van de modellen van Opta hoeven we de komende maanden geen spannende titelstrijd te verwachten. Het databureau ziet PSV als absolute topfavoriet voor de landstitel. De spanning lijkt vooral te zitten in de race om Europees voetbal en de strijd tegen degradatie.

items.title: Rosenior ziet druk als voorrecht en noemt Van Gaal als inspiratiebron
items.summary: Liam Rosenior gaf vrijdag zijn eerste persconferentie als manager van Chelsea. De Engelsman blikte vooruit op het FA Cup-duel met Charlton Athletic en zijn tijd bij Chelsea in het algemeen. Daarbij noemde hij Louis van Gaal als √©√©n van zijn voorbeelden.

items.title: Bukayo Saka agrees new five-year Arsenal contract with big wage increase
items.summary: Deal understood to lift pay to about ¬£300,000 a week Arsenal keen to reward Declan Rice with new deal Bukayo Saka has agreed a new five-year contract at Arsenal that will make him one of the highest-paid players in the club‚Äôs history. The England forward‚Äôs deal that he signed in May 2023 is thought to be worth about ¬£200,000 a week and is due to expire in 2027. Saka said before the Champions League quarter-final victory against Real Madrid in April that he wanted to ‚Äúwin wearing this badge‚Äù but also said he was in ‚Äúno rush‚Äù to sign a new contract. items.title: Rosenior will ignore 'noise' after Chelsea appointment
items.summary: Liam Rosenior says he will be his own man and ignore the "noise" around his appointment as Chelsea manager.

items.title: Saka agrees new long-term contract with Arsenal
items.summary: Bukayo Saka agrees a new long-term contract with Arsenal.

items.title: Neymar begins recovery post-knee op, looks to WC
items.summary: Neymar has started his recovery process after undergoing minor surgery on his left knee on Dec. 22.

items.title: Smart, independent and in demand ‚Ä¶ but would Glasner be a good fit for Manchester United?
items.summary: The Austrian has thrived at teams who do not expect to have much of the ball but this style may not work at Old Trafford where possession is expected Oliver Glasner has shown a penchant for one-liners, as well a 3-4-2-1 formation, since he took over at Crystal Palace almost two years ago. The Austrian declared he was ‚Äúnot David Copperfield‚Äù in his first press conference and usually has a saying for whatever situation Palace are in, such as declaring they must not be ‚Äúone-hit wonders‚Äù after winning the FA Cup. It was therefore no surprise to find Glasner had come prepared when he played a straight bat to questions about his future this week after Ruben Amorim‚Äôs sacking by Manchester United. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not a gambler,‚Äù he said when asked to comment on the fact he is the bookmakers‚Äô favourite to take over at Old Trafford in the summer. Continue reading...

items.title: Kyogo 'unlikely' to return to Celtic in January, says O'Neill
items.summary: Celtic interim manager Martin O'Neill says it is "unlikely" that striker Kyogo Furuhashi will return to the club.

items.title: Tottenham latest: Roma preparing offer for Dragusin
Man City confirms Semenyo signing in $84m deal
items.summary: Manchester City have announced the signing of Antoine Semenyo from Bournemouth.

items.title: Pep: Man City beat 'many clubs' to sign Semenyo
items.summary: Pep Guardiola has revealed Manchester City beat off competition from "many clubs" to sign Antoine Semenyo from AFC Bournemouth.

items.title: Spindleberry tipped to claim Mares' Chase crown at Cheltenham in March
items.summary: With the possibility of cancellations of racing this weekend, the Weekend Winners team look forward to the Cheltenham Festival with some ante-post angles.
